## CODE

Below is the code use to construct the plot above. You can find the entire code [here](https://github.com/inqs909/ttw/blob/main/posts/wk_3_4_25/plot_code.R).




```{r}
#| eval: false
#| echo: true

## Loading Libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(csucistats)
library(ggridges)
library(camcorder)


## Loading Data
longbeach <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/main/data/2025/2025-03-04/longbeach.csv')


```
